name: Avoid or Destroyed
description:
Avoid or Destroyed is a mobile (android) minigame to play in your free time.


You must avoid the blue squares or you will get destroyed!



Requirements:

-Android Device

-Skills




---The music was provided by NCS---
Tobu & Marcus Mouya - Running Away [NCS Release]
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQT_2XS45Uk&list=LL0G58tnd4ZcEVZVwQR08Zlg&index=2
